import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./MyRecipes.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function MyRecipes(){const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[time,setTime]=useState('');const[ingredients,setIngredients]=useState('');const[image,setImage]=useState('');// ‚úÖ 1. –ó–ê–í–ê–ù–¢–ê–ñ–ï–ù–ù–Ø –†–ï–¶–ï–ü–¢–Ü–í –∑ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–∞
useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/recipes').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setRecipes(data)).catch(err=>console.error('–ü–æ–º–∏–ª–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏ –∑–∞–≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ñ:',err));},[]);// ‚úÖ 2. –î–û–î–ê–í–ê–ù–ù–Ø –†–ï–¶–ï–ü–¢–£ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ POST
const addNewRecipe=()=>{if(!title||!time||!ingredients||!image){alert('–ë—É–¥—å –ª–∞—Å–∫–∞, –∑–∞–ø–æ–≤–Ω—ñ—Ç—å —É—Å—ñ –ø–æ–ª—è.');return;}const newRecipe={title,time,ingredients,image};fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/recipes',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(newRecipe)}).then(res=>res.json()).then(()=>{setTitle('');setTime('');setIngredients('');setImage('');// üîÑ –æ–Ω–æ–≤–ª—é—î–º–æ —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –ø—ñ—Å–ª—è –¥–æ–¥–∞–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è
return fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/recipes').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setRecipes(data));}).catch(err=>console.error('–ü–æ–º–∏–ª–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏ –¥–æ–¥–∞–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ñ:',err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u041C\u043E\u0457 \u0440\u0435\u0446\u0435\u043F\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"add-recipe-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u0414\u043E\u0434\u0430\u0442\u0438 \u043D\u043E\u0432\u0438\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0446\u0435\u043F\u0442"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u041D\u0430\u0437\u0432\u0430 \u0440\u0435\u0446\u0435\u043F\u0442\u0443"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:time,onChange:e=>setTime(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u0427\u0430\u0441 \u043F\u0440\u0438\u0433\u043E\u0442\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:ingredients,onChange:e=>setIngredients(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u0406\u043D\u0433\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0454\u043D\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:image,onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u041F\u043E\u0441\u0438\u043B\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044F \u043D\u0430 \u0444\u043E\u0442\u043E (URL)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addNewRecipe,children:"\u0414\u043E\u0434\u0430\u0442\u0438"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recipes-grid",children:recipes.map((recipe,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"recipe-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:recipe.image,alt:recipe.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:recipe.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0427\u0430\u0441 \u043F\u0440\u0438\u0433\u043E\u0442\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044F: ",recipe.time]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u0406\u043D\u0433\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0456\u0454\u043D\u0442\u0438: ",recipe.ingredients]})]},index))})]});}
